t=int(raw_input())\r\n\r\nwhile t>0:\r\n\r\n\tt=t-1\r\n\r\n\tn=int(raw_input())\r\n\r\n\tv=raw_input().split(' ')\r\n\r\n\th=raw_input().split(' ')\r\n\r\n\tfor i in range(n):\r\n\r\n\t\tv[i]=int(v[i])\r\n\r\n\tfor i in range(n):\r\n\r\n\t\th[i]=int(h[i])\r\n\r\n\th.sort()\r\n\r\n\tv.sort()\r\n\r\n\tf=0\r\n\r\n\tfor i in range(n):\r\n\r\n\t\tif v[i]>h[i]:\r\n\r\n\t\t\tf=1\r\n\r\n\tif f==1:\r\n\r\n\t\tprint(\"LOSE\")\r\n\r\n\telse:\r\n\r\n\t\tprint(\"WIN\")\r\n
